Highlights in Jazz #15: Billie Holiday Remembered - Bennie Morton, Doc Cheatham, Earle Warren, Buddy Tate, George Wein, Panama Francis, George Duvivier, Ruth Brisbane, Haywood Henry (Tape 1 of 2)
Highlights in Jazz #15: Billie Holiday Remembered - Bennie Morton, Doc Cheatham, Earle Warren, Buddy Tate, George Wein, Panama Francis, George Duvivier, Ruth Brisbane, Haywood Henry (Tape 1 of 2)

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in moderate flagging throughout. This flagging is generally above the performers, but intensifies in low lighting. Mild image jitter throughout. Elsewhere, there are occasional mild dropouts, and occasional tape damage and tape wear. Occasional inherent exposure adjustments and mild ghosting. Luma is adjusted to mitigate clipping from glare. Audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."
